moves.5. Bg5 Bb4 6. Bxf6+ gxf6 7. Bc4 c6 8. d5: breaking open lines is the easiest way to win games in which one is up big material
moves.8... b5 9. Bb3 a6 10. dxe6 Nh6 11. exf7: attacking the rook and preparing to bring the rooks into play to finish this game quickly
moves.24... Ke8 25. Qa8+: here black changed his time control to move/6.  is such a thing legal?  it seems that one should finish the game at the same time control one started with.  at any rate black is quite lost here and only prolongs when white will formally get the point.
